timeline.message:
Bump vavr

Fixes #2246

Signed-off-by: Jan Jansen <jan.jansen@gdata.de>

timeline.bodyText: The change from <tt> to <code> seems to be unrelated to the stated goal of bumping the version of vavr, but the change itself is fine for consistency, so no need to factor this out, unless you didn't mean to commit this delta.
timeline.author: mbrukman

replies.bodyText: I did execute JanusGraph yesterday with java 11 during my try to test these changes. It failed since tt is deprecated.
replies.author: farodin91
